title: Humanitix-Notion Database Integration
description: User requires ALL properties from Humanitix API endpoints to be included in Notion databases. Current implementation only includes subset. Need 4 databases: Events, Event Dates, Orders, Tickets with complete multi-date event support.

solution.description: Successfully completed comprehensive test import with ALL 57 Event properties, 10 Event Date properties, 35+ Order properties, and 45+ Ticket properties. Generated complete JSON import files for 5 events with 8 event dates. Multi-date event support implemented and tested.
